content.rendered:
Jiliaaa War of Dragon is an online slot game that take you journey to the land of dragons, where you can unleash power of those mythical creatures to win bigger reward. The game features 5 reels and 243 paylines, with a lots of symbols that include dragons, rock lion, and other elements of the dragon world. The game is design with sharp graphics and an eastern theme, complete with a traditional soundtrack that sets the mood for a thrilling adventure. With exciting features like free spins, and wild symbols, Jiliaaa War of Dragon offers a unique and engaging gaming experience that is sure to keep you entertained for hours on end.

War of Dragons Game Rules

War Of Dragons Slot Machine comes with 5 reels and offers 243 ways to win. There’s a list of eleven standard symbols in this game – a red envelope, a fish, a turtle, six playing card icons in unique colors, a rock lion, and a phoenix bird. The silhouette of a green dragon head acts as a wild icon. It replaces all missing standard symbols when necessary. If you get at least three lucky coins (Scatter icons) anywhere in view, you will activate Free Spins. Red envelopes bring a bet bonus multiplier during free spins. Also, before this round starts, you can choose the number of free spins and the size of multipliers.

  • War Of Dragons is a video slot with 5 reels, 3 rows and 243 ways.
  • Bet line wins pay if in succession starting from the leftmost reel to right according to paytable.
  • Only the maximum amount of winnings on each line will be paid out.
  • Winnings = Pay x Lines x (Bet / 30).
  • In free game, if 3 or more consecutive Scatters appear again from the leftmost reel to the right that will win one more round of free game.
  • In the event of any malfunction that causes the outcome of the game to be undecided, the game round will be invalid.

Free Spin

  • 25 Free Games: If one or more White Dragon Wilds combined with a bet line wins that payouts will be multiplied by 2, 3, or 5.
  • 20 Free Games: If one or more Red Dragon Wilds combined with a bet line wins that payouts will be multiplied by 3, 5, or 8.
  • 15 Free Games: If one or more Black Dragon Wilds combined with a bet line wins that payouts will be multiplied by 5, 8, or 10.
  • 13 Free Games: If one or more Black Dragon Wilds combined with a bet line wins that payouts will be multiplied by 8, 10, or 15.
  • 10 Free Games: If one or more Yellow Dragon Wilds combined with a bet line wins that payouts will be multiplied by 10, 15, or 30.
